content.text:
# Crayon Shin-chan: Saikyou Kazoku Kasukabe King Wii

| modes = Single-player, multiplayer
| genre = Party
| platforms = Wii
}}
is a videogame developed and published for the Nintendo Wii based upon the manga and anime series Crayon Shin-chan. The game was released in Spain on April 25, 2008, by 505 Games as Shin Chan: Las Nuevas Aventuras para Wii. The game was a launch title for the Wii in Japan.
The game consists of a series of mini-games integrated into the world of Shin-chan.
